attributes.action: Legislate that tax revenues raised for specific projects or initiatives are used solely for the purposes that they are introduced for.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people are under the impression that taxes raised for specific projects or initiatives are merely stealth taxes to generate revenue for the treasury. Whilst the government needs funds to allocate as it sees fit, taxes that are raised for specific reasons should be used solely for those purposes. This would cover various 'green' and 'transport' taxes and should cover local charges as well as central government taxes(ie congestion charges).
